channel.title: [PI] Custom NPC
channel.description: Is there a guide on how to add custom NPC? I tried adding them myself, but it seems that it isn't working. I added the NPC to EntityDef and the correct models, correct NPC ID in npc.cfg and the correct IDs in spawn. Does anyone have any idea on how to make this work?
